name: MONSTRFITE
description:
MONSTRFITE is a simple, bite-sized, yet mechanically deep indie roguelike. Learn spells, collect powerful treasures, and build your strategy however you decide! In MONSTRFITE you will battle a large variety of enemies in turn-based combat as you try to uncover the secrets of the dungeon. Key features include:

  • Robust and flexible point-buy / soulslike leveling system. Stats are carefully balanced to make any build viable, and there are no level caps!
  • A wide array of unique spells and items. Uncover powerful and unique synergies!
  • Challenging, yet bite-sized gameplay. Runs are 20-30 minutes, and victory is a rewarding challenge.
  • Multiple endings. Try to survive as long as possible, or power your way to the end of the game. Try to discover the path to the extra-challenging true ending.
  • Unique turn-based and resource management game mechanics. MONSTRFITE is designed to challenge your risk-taking skills with every choice made in and out of combat.
